title: Space 1: staying alive [BBC][Spa-Eng]
description:
FORMAT: DVD5 Full DVD
SYSTEM: PAL
LANGUAGES: 2.0: Spanish, English
SUBS: Spanish, English
ASPECT RATIO: 4:3

Production Year: 2001 BBC
Country: United Kingdom.
Length: 50 min.
Director: Luke Campbell, Jeremy Turner

The universe is an extremely dangerous site(place). Using technology top, we explore the phenomena that wait for us in the cosmos: asteroids capable of pulverizing a planet, comets that can of eliminating any sign of life, and most known of all of them: the black hole.

Till now, the humanity has fixed them up to avoid them, but also we question till when will we be to except of a spatial catastrophe? What must we do to avoid it? According to the scientists, the probabilities of long-term survival are scanty. We approach black holes and to other stars that might have catastrophic effects on the Earth.

There are two possibilities of surviving in the Earth. The first one is to create a planetary protection. The second one consists of going to another planet. To where do we go?
